content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-59.5, -111.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (-59.5, -111.5)
- Boiler at position (-46.5, -122.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-68.5, -95.5)
- Connected via pipe network (positions omitted for brevity)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (9.0, -64.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (9.0, -64.0)

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (-15.5, -77.5)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -76.0)
- Iron Chest at position (-15.5, -77.5)

### Iron Plate Storage Facility
Consists of:
- Wooden Chest at position (6.5, -59.5)

### Miscellaneous Entities
- Inserter at position (6.5, -60.5) not receiving electricity
- Lab with no research in progress

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting Items
- Ensure that the target entity contains the item you wish to extract. For example, attempting to extract copper plates from a furnace that does not contain them will result in an error.

### Errors when Inserting Items
- Verify that the item you are trying to insert is available in your inventory. Attempting to insert copper ore when none is available will cause an error.

### Errors with Fuel Management
- Ensure that all fuel-consuming entities, such as boilers and burner mining drills, have sufficient fuel to operate. Lack of fuel will halt operations.

### Errors with Power Connectivity
- Ensure that all electrical entities, such as inserters, are connected to a power network to function correctly. Lack of power will prevent them from operating.
